attributes.action: Force Virgin Media to honour its contract with NTL/Telewest Customers re SKY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Virgin media have without consultation with its customers dropped some of the most viewed Sky channels citing cost as the cause. However NTL/Telewest customers have enjoyed these channels for many years and they were integral to their viewing packages - we would like them back please

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
